question: NBA: Will the Nets beat the Mavericks by more than 2.5 points in their December 7 matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for December 7:

If the Brooklyn Nets win by over 2.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Dallas Mavericks lose by less than 2.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by December 14, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: NBA: Will the sum of points in Nets v Mavericks be an even or an odd number?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game between Brooklyn Nets and Dallas Mavericks, scheduled for December 7:

If the total sum of points scored is an even number (ie. score is 120-118, 97-133, 115-113...), this market will resolve to “Even”.

If the total sum of points scored is an odd number (ie. score is 120-119, 97-132, 114-115...), this market will resolve to “Odd”.

If the game is not completed by December 14, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: UEFA Champions League: Which group B team will qualify to the knockout phase?
description:
This is the market on the Champions League 2021/22 Group B standings.

Two teams out of four from each group advance to the round of 16.

In group B, Liverpool FC has already guaranteed the advancement, however the runner-up is still not resolved.

The deciding games, Porto v Atletico and Milan v Liverpool are scheduled to take place on December 7, 3 PM ET.

This market will resolve to one of the remaining teams (Atletico Madrid, AC Milan and Porto FC) which will win the 2nd spot in group B. If the qualifying team isn't determined by December 15, 2021, the market will resolve equally among the brackets.

Read more about standings and fixtures of UEFA Champions League: https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/
